mapper.select: SELECT yo.id, yo.user_id, yo.idle_id, yu.name as userName, yi.name as idleName, yo.create_time, yo.share_value, yo.share_cycle, yo.share_num FROM yw_order yo LEFT JOIN yw_user yu on yu.id = yo.user_id LEFT JOIN yw_idle yi on yi.id = yo.idle_id WHERE yo.id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yw_order( id, user_id, idle_id, create_time, share_value, status, share_cycle, share_num )VALUES ( UUID(), #{userId}, #{idleId}, now(), #{shareValue}, #{status}, #{shareCycle}, #{shareNum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE yw_order SET idle_id = #{idleId}, user_id = #{userId}, update_time = now(), share_value = #{shareValue}, share_cycle = #{shareCycle}, share_num = #{shareNum} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE yw_order SET status = #{status}, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(DISTINCT id) FROM yw_order WHERE idle_id = #{idleId} and status = 'COMPLETED'
